programme.title: Seasons of Saturn
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Seasons of Saturn, S03E01, Saturn is the second largest planet and has an astonishing 60 moons in its orbit. Thanks to the Cassini mission, it's also one of the most studied and most photographed planets in our neighborhood.

programme.title: Landsat
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Landsat, S04E06, Take a look at Landsat 8, the advanced planetary explorer with a 900 million dollar price tag! It is designed to peer across multiple wavelengths to reveal complex and ever-changing details that are undetectable by the human eye.

programme.title: Superscopes
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Superscopes, S02E02, The human eye can only see visible light, a small spectrum of electromagnetic waves. Today, we have instruments that let us perceive all wavelengths.

programme.title: Borderland / Mars: Red Dawn
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E15, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Rocky Shores / Silent Partner
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E14, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Hubble's Renaissance

programme.title: Night Fire
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Night Fire, S02E05, The Northern Lights are more than just beautiful; they tell us about the make up of our planet, our sun, and may even be a signpost for the possibility of life on other planets.

programme.title: Vesta Unveiled

programme.title: Landing on Mars
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Landing on Mars, S03E06, Mars sparks our curiosity like no other planet because it is so reachable. Despite having landed there, most of the information we gather is still done by instruments in the planet's orbit.

programme.title: Cosmic Rays
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Cosmic Rays, S04E04, Cosmic rays can tell us much about the universe. They are not simply another form of light, but carriers of information about powerful and unseen processes at work thousands or even millions of light years away.

programme.title: Virtual Universe
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Virtual Universe, S02E06, Our understanding of the cosmos is limited by the amount of time we have to see it. Fortunately, computer simulations can help us see how galaxies interact over millions of years, and even how dark matter structures the universe.

programme.title: Gravity

programme.category: Series, Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction

programme.title: Episode 1

programme.title: Episode 2

programme.title: Episode 3

programme.title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Dragonfire, S01E01, Mel and the Doctor are in for a cool reception on the trading colony Iceworld, where they discover excitable teenage waitress Ace, space maverick Sabalom Glitz, and legends of dragons and treasure.

programme.title: Episode 2
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Dragonfire, S01E02, The time travellers, accompanied by Glitz and Ace, search the ice caves for the treasure which is supposed to be guarded by a fearsome dragon. Little do they are leading Kane straight to it.

programme.title: Episode 3
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Dragonfire, S01E03, Having sold their souls to him years ago, Kane's disaffected staff plot to kill him. Meanwhile, he plots to obtain the dragon's treasure so he can escape from Iceworld and wreak havoc once more.

programme.title: Part 1
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Remembrance of the Daleks, S01E01, In Shoreditch, 1963, the Doctors past begins to catch up with him at the Totters Lane junkyard where his adventures began - and to where an old terror is returning.
programme.category: Series, Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction

programme.title: Part 2
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Remembrance of the Daleks, S01E02, Renegade Daleks battle Imperial Daleks for control of the Hand of Omega and Ace takes them on single-handedly at Coal Hill School, while Ratcliffe makes his move.
programme.category: Series, Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction

programme.title: Part 3
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Remembrance of the Daleks, S01E03, The Doctor discovers the difference between the two Dalek factions and why they want a stellar manipulator. He hopes Captain Gilmore's people are up to the task ahead.
programme.category: Series, Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction

programme.title: Part 4
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Remembrance of the Daleks, S01E04, The streets of East London shake under a civil war bering fought between the Daleks, as the Doctor forces the Dalek Emperor to reveal himself to be Davros, waging one last battle.
programme.category: Series, Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction

programme.title: Diary Of A Serial Arsonist/The Lost Clue
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E10, A highly-regarded California arson investigator is suspected of setting a series of fires, and in Texas, a man is convicted of raping and murdering his 68-year-old neighbor.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E4016, DNA evidence found on a murder victim whose body had been dumped in a Dairy Queen drive-thru leads to the arrest of Houston's notorious "tourniquet killer."

programme.title: Til Death Do Us Part
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E24, Just two years into their marriage, Chuck and Cheryl Hall are torn apart when Chuck finds Cheryl murdered. Though Cheryl's family is certain they know her killer, the law isn't as sure. After several decades, a DNA match erases all doubt.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E17, A look at the case of James Allen Selby, a serial rapist who eluded police for years while attacking 11 women in five states - Oklahoma, Nevada, California, Arizona, and Colorado.

programme.title: Texas Drifter/Fingerprints/Rose Among Thorns
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E03, From England to Texas to Georgia, I.R. will go inside cold case units and watch as police use ballistics testing, old fashioned fingerprints and a new DNA data bank for criminals, to crack open the mysteries of unsolved crimes.

programme.title: Friday Night Ghosts
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E15, In late 1983, the bodies of five people abducted from a local fast food restaurant are found brutally murdered. The main suspect is long believed to be a well-connected local man, until new evidence reveals the true killers.

programme.title: Eyes of a Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E13, On February 2, 2010, two masked gunmen commit a violent robbery and shoot Michael Temple Jr., rendering him a quadriplegic for five years before his death. In this unusual cold case, DNA is used to create a sketch of the killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E5011, Nine years after the murders of a mother and her teenage daughters, a wiretapped conversation helps police to crack the case. And the baffling murder of a Virginia woman is solved when human bones are discovered by a geologist in North Carolina.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E24, Guns found dumped in a pond help police to solve the 15-year-old murder of Detroit cab company owner. And the rape and murder of an Atlanta TV station receptionist goes cold for 20 years before DNA links a man to the crime.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E05, Law enforcement officials fear they may have to release a serial killer from prison until a 24-year-old murder case gives them a chance to lock him up for good.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E20, DNA found on a marijuana joint in Florida in 2005 helps to solve the 1988 rape and murder of a California woman. And a cold case of murder in Illinois heats up when a jailhouse lawyer turns jailhouse snitch.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E06, The murder of a 73-year-old man leads police on a long chase for a man who's suspected of identity theft and bears a rose tattoo with the name "Phyllis".

programme.title: The Original Nightstalker
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E05, In the 1980s, a serial killer prowled the posh streets of Orange County. Police were unaware of the serial attacks until 1996, when DNA revealed the killer's secret and they linked four murders to a single DNA profile.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic: Cold Case Files Classics, S02E26, Best of the Year Marathon: Serial Killers
MST3K: Master Ninja II, 19920125000000 +0000, Joel and the 'bots endure two equally bad episodes from the failed action seriesThe Master(1984).

programme.title: Final Justice
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000, S10E08, When tough-as-nails Texas Deputy Sheriff Thomas Jefferson Geronimo captures a member of the Italian mob, only he can successfully get his prisoner back to Italy to stand trial.

programme.title: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary: The Crew
programme.desc: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary, S01E09, In part two of the complete history of MST3K, Joel and the rest of the team discuss the Satellite of Love crew.

programme.title: Lost Continent
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Lost Continent, S02E08, A military team sent to search for a lost rocket ends up trapped on a mountain inhabited by dinosaurs in Lost Continent.

programme.title: Last Of The Wild Horses
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Last Of The Wild Horses, S06E11, A cowboy winds up in the middle of a turf war between a rancher and his neighbors in Last of the Wild Horses.
MST3K: Invasion Of The Neptune Men, 19971011000000 +0000, Our heroes discover just how boring an alien attack on Tokyo can be when they view an anti-vehicle for Sonny Chiba.

programme.title: Blood Waters of Dr. Z
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Blood Waters of Dr. Z, S10E05, Seeking revenge against those responsible for stripping him of his tenure and the denial of human research subjects, Dr. Z mutates himself into a hideous and murderous half-human-half-fish-like creature!

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Undersea Kingdom - Chapter 1: Beneath The Ocean Floor
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E14, A scientist and a reporter discover the lost city of Atlantis, a technologically advanced society.

programme.title: Mitchell
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Mitchell, S05E12, The trio sit through a dreary Joe Don Baker disasterpiece as Gypsy tries to find a way to save Joel from being killed by the Mads.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Out Of This World
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E22, It's Heaven vs. Hell in this short. Plus: bread?

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: The Phantom Creeps - Chapter 3: Crashing Towers
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E12, The final chapter of the 1939 serial starring Bela Lugosi.

MST3K: Gamera, 19910608000000 +0000, A giant mutated turtle wakes from eons of slumber and attacks Japan in Gamera: The Giant Monster (1965). The Bots create their own beauty salon and are treated to a visit from Gamera himself.

programme.title: Grand Openings
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E06, Hallmark Original Series. As the nightclub opening nears, Trace spends late nights practicing.

programme.title: All Our Yesterdays
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E07, Hallmark Original Series. Mick receives damaging information about Thomas.

programme.title: Forest Through the Trees
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E08, Hallmark Original Series. Abby and Trace talk about their past and the future during a camping getaway.

programme.title: The Royal Court
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E09, Hallmark Original Series. After his band's video goes viral, Trace receives offers.

programme.title: Freefall
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E10, Hallmark Original Series. Mark offers Trace and his band a worldwide tour deal.

programme.title: Running Scared
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E02, Hallmark Original Series. Middleton's Heritage Festival gets everyone in town talking.

programme.title: Do the Right Thing
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E03, Hallmark Original Series. Trouble is brewing after Cassie's mystery guest Ashley goes missing.

programme.title: All in the Family
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E04, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie's mischievous cousin Abigail is back in Middleton.

programme.title: The Truth About Lies
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E05, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie's magic can't keep her away from Abigail's scheming.

programme.title: The Storm
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E06, Hallmark Original Series. A blizzard threatens disaster in Middleton.

programme.title: Together We Stand...
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E07, Hallmark Original Series. The winter storm continues to pose a threat to all of Middleton.

programme.title: True Colors
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E08, Hallmark Original Series. Middleton's enchanting "Good Witch" Cassie receives devastating news.

programme.title: Second Time Around
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E01, Hallmark Original Series. Sam's ex-wife Linda threatens to come between them.

programme.title: Driven
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E02, Hallmark Original Series. The arrival of a man from Cassie's past may complicate her relationship.

programme.title: Out of the Past
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E03, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie's old friend John attempts to unearth their shared college memories.

programme.title: The Trouble with Love
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E04, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie feels upset after Grace admits she's been spending more time with Sam.

programme.title: Fragile Balance
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E03, A 15-year-old infiltrates the SGC with the startling news that he is Colonel Jack O'Neill, having mysteriously reverse aged 30 years overnight. Possessing O'Neill's knowledge, exact DNA and, above all, his attitude, can he really be O'Neill?

programme.title: Orpheus
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E04, Through the help of Daniel, Teal'c visualizes that Rya'c and Bra'tac are being held prisoner in a Goa'uld death camp. With SG-1's help, Teal'c sets out to rescue his son and his mentor, but can he overcome his fears in time?

programme.title: Revisions
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E05, Six thousand light-years away, O'Neill and the SG-1 team discover a devastated universe where the inhabitants must live in a protective dome. They survive through an all-controlling computer system called the Link. But is it a savior, or a curse?

programme.title: Lifeboat
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E06, SG-1 finds a crashed spaceship containing hundreds of people in a cryogenic sleep. Stunned by an unseen weapon, the team is struck unconscious and, upon awakening, discovers that several of the frozen personalities now inhabit Daniel's body!

programme.title: Enemy Mine
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E07, An SGC Naquadah mining operation is attacked by a native tribe of Unas. SG-1 is sent to protect the miners and discovers that the Unas are guarding land they believe is sacred. Instead of eradicating the Unas, Daniel races to negotiate with them.

programme.title: Submersion
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E18, The team searches the ocean for a mobile geothermal drilling station the ancients left dormant. Cautiously exploring the station, Teyla thinks she senses the presence of a Wraith. Weir, believing it's pressure affecting Teyla, has the team press on.

programme.title: Vengeance
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E19, After helping relocate the Taranans, the Atlantis team realizes they haven't heard from the village in a long period of time. It appears the Taranans have just abandoned their village until McKay detects life signs well beneath the surface.

programme.title: First Strike
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E20, The team is shocked when a satellite housing a stargate takes up orbit above Atlantis. When the stargate begins transmitting an energy beam, attacking the city, McKay takes a page from the Ancients and opts to sink Atlantis back into the ocean.

programme.title: Adrift
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E01, When Atlantis starts shutting down due to a damaged power system, Rodney McKay turns off all non-essential systems. But in just 28 hours, McKay realizes the citys shields may fail completely and its inhabitants will succumb the vacuum of space.

programme.title: Lifeline
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E02, Lt. Col. Sheppard leads a daring raid to secure a ZPM that will save Atlantis. When the Replicators become aware of the incursion into their city, Sheppards team must keep them at bay or else abandon the mission and their hope of saving Atlantis.

programme.title: Reunion
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E03, Ronon reconnects with a group of Satedans from his past who enlist the Atlantis team's help on a dangerous mission against the Wraith. But after the Atlantis crew is captured, Ronon is faced with the truth about his old friends new loyalties.

programme.title: Doppelganger
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E04, During an exploratory walk on a jungle planet, Sheppard touches a glowing crystalline growth and becomes host to an infectious energy form. Once on Atlantis, the entity begins to move from person to person, putting the entire crew at risk.

programme.title: Travelers
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E05, On his way back to Atlantis, Lt. Col. Sheppard is taken prisoner by a rogue ship helmed by a ruthless human commander with a secret agenda. As the team searches for him, Sheppard's resourcefulness is put to the test as he tries to stay alive.

programme.title: Subversion
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E18, After Dr. Rush has a disturbing dream, he suspects that Telford may be a spy for the Lucian Alliance. Rush confides in Col. Young who suspects there may have been residual memory overlap during the doctors switch with Colonel Telford days before.

programme.title: Incursion (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E19, When Col. Telford reveals the Destiny is in imminent danger of being boarded by the Lucian Alliance, they launch an attack on the Lucian Alliances secret base. Meanwhile, the Lucian Alliance forces Dr. Rush to help stage an assault on the Destiny.

programme.title: Incursion (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E20, The Destiny crew must fight for their lives when members of the Lucian Alliance come through the Stargate, hell-bent on taking the ship by force. Meanwhile, the Destiny starts having ship-wide power blackouts caused by deadly bursts of radiation.

programme.title: Intervention
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E01, After Colonel Young and his military personnel are captured by the Lucian Alliance, Dannic abandons them on a nearby planet. Meanwhile on the ship, Dr. Rush, Brody, Chloe, and Eli attempt a risky plan to force the Lucians to surrender.

programme.title: The Gentle Art Of Listening
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S01E009, Sympathy and responsibility are at odds when Brenda volunteers for a teen crisis hotline.

programme.title: Isn't It Romantic?
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S01E010, The chemistry between Brenda and Dylan starts to heat up when Brenda accidentally catches him in the shower, then comforts him after he fights with his father.

programme.title: B.Y.O.B.
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S01E011, Both Walsh twins face the temptation to drink alcohol when their peers are doing it all around them.

programme.title: One Man and a Baby

programme.title: Slumber Party

programme.title: East Side Story

programme.title: Palm Springs Weekend

programme.title: Stand (Up) and Deliver

programme.title: It's Only a Test

programme.title: April Is the Cruelest Month

programme.title: The Swimmer
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E09, Upset about his failed marriage to Neely, Mitch goes for a day-long tower swim along the beach and encounters problems that distract from his own, including April and Craig's May/December romance, and reluctant heroes Cody and JD.

programme.title: Friends Forever
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E10, A young, hearing-impaired girl learns a lesson in friendship when she, Mitch and Alex protect an orangutan, while Cody and Jessie deal with its abusive owner.

programme.title: The Edge
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E11, Cody puts his career, and his life, on the line when he uses a performance-enhancing supplement in hopes of making the Olympic swim team. Alex becomes the object of Mitch's rejection, and Newmie's affection.

programme.title: The Big Blue
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E12, Mitch tries to reunite an Army parachutist with her estranged Naval-officer father, while Cody helps a beautiful woman try to reach record-setting depths at a national free-diving competition.

programme.title: Come Fly with Me
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E13, After he tries to save Tanner from his abusive father, Mitch ends up on the wrong side of the law. Meanwhile, Jessie's irresistible charm makes a stunt pilot's heart take flight.

programme.title: Boys will be Boys
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E14, When caught up in a high-risk adventure at sea, Craig tells Mitch a shocking secret. Meanwhile, Jessie works to creatively end JD and Cody's rivalry during a beachside triathlon, and April comes clean with Manny.

programme.title: Baywatch Grand Prix
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E15, Mitch feels the need for speed when Tanner's cousin, Damon Lusk, a race car driver in town for a major competition, visits Baywatch. Meanwhile, Newmie and the gang develop a TV show about lifeguards that they try to sell it into syndication.

programme.title: Baywatch Down Under, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E16, After Mitch's lifeguard buddy's ex-wife dies in Australia, Mitch and the team accompany him on a trip down under to meet the son he's never known.

programme.title: Baywatch Down Under, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E17, While team Baywatch prepares to compete against the Australian guards, Jake must choose between staying down under with his son or returning home. The competing lifeguards must put their intense rivalry aside to save a life.

programme.title: Water Dance
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E18, Cody learns a lesson in love when he and Mitch help a troubled violinist escape her dangerously overbearing mentor with a secret agenda. Meanwhile, Alex sets out to prove her worth at Baywatch by retaking the grueling rookie test with Jessie.

programme.title: Double Jeopardy
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E19, Alex tries to save a diamond smuggler whose partners want him to "sleep with the fishes." Neely makes Hobie a tempting offer that divides the Buchannon household.

programme.title: Wave Rage
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E20, After Manny suffers a life-altering injury during a rescue, April tries to save him from himself. Neely meets her match in Alex when she tries to discredit Mitch.

programme.title: Galaxy Girls
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E21, April and Jessie search for the perfect celebrity host for a seaside beauty contest. Mitch and Alex help Manny adjust to his paralysis.

programme.title: Castles in the Sand
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E22, Alex's search for the creator of several elaborate sandcastles is interrupted when she gets stuck entertaining her best friend's fiance, who falls madly for Mitch. Cody loses his cool when his new boat is stolen while he's scuba diving with Newmie.

programme.title: Aloha Baywatch
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E01, Mitch envisions an International "Top Gun" style lifeguard school in Hawaii. He invites Sean Monroe to lead the new team, which will include a variety of highly-rated lifeguards from beaches around the world.

programme.title: Mahalo Hawaii
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E02, Amidst the chaos, the new Baywatch Hawaii team must learn to work and live together. Jason meets a man with a mysterious past. A girl Mitch saved suffers from secondary drowning, leading to a critical test of the new recruits.

programme.title: Weak Link
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E03, Tanner visits Mitch, tours the Islands, and befriends a dying girl. After failing her initial "test", Dawn challenges Sean to a dangerous contest with her future at Baywatch hanging in the balance. JD competes to join the America's Cup Sailing Team.
